Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 36 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
Transition plans are an area of disclosure that have characteristics in common with policies,
targets, and actions. Climate transition plans for example are effectively action plans to achieve
the targets for carbon emissions.
Question ID 526 and ID 1021 – Disclosure of a non-material
